Entries.GreenRain: Whaa! Is it acid? Will it burn through the roof and sizzle us alive?$8#$b#I have to keep my little brother safe!$7
Entries.eventSeen_45: I better lie low for a while. I wouldn't want to get on Mayor Lewis' bad side!
Entries.firstVisit_Sewer: Heheh... So you've been to the sewer, huh? I've sneaked down there a few times myself. It's pretty creepy.#$e#How could I tell? Hmm... let's just say... 'the nose knows'.$h
Entries.eventSeen_733330_memory_oneday: If... I mean when... my dad gets back, I wonder if he'll be the same as I remember him?$s
Entries.FlowerDance_Accept_Spouse: Aw, I have to put on that stuffy suit again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright.$s
Entries.Mon2: Hey, how's it going?#$e#Last night I practised guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy.$s#$e#Bye, I've got something to do...
Entries.Wed_19: Hey, mate... what the heck is your problem? Sorry I asked.$a
Entries.Wed10: Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!^@. Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.$10
Entries.Thu6_1: I think my dad might be coming back in a year or so.#$e#I guess you might be able to meet him, then. If you're still living here.#$e#You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
Entries.Thu2: My dad is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here...#$e#He'll come back someday.#$e#...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...$s
Entries.Thu_2: Well, my dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.Thu2_2: Well, my dad is back. Have you met him?#$b#I'm just glad he's okay.
Entries.Fri4: Dad used to work as a bin man in the city.#$e#You don't even want to know some of the things he found in people's rubbish.
Entries.Sat4: Oh! I just remembered I'm supposed to call my grandma. Okay, I'm going to put this elastic band on my wrist so I don't forget.#$e#I have to make little reminders for myself or else I'll totally forget to do things.$h
Entries.10: Did you watch the footy last night?#$b#Or wait, do you even have a telly...?
Entries.summer_Tue4: Hi, @. Do you want to hang out or something?#$e#I'm so energised during summer I hardly have to sleep!
Entries.summer_Thu6_2: Sometimes I can hear my dad pacing down the hallway at night.$s#$b#...But he won't tell us what's troubling him.
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey... something smells good, like pizza.#$e#Do you smell that? Maybe mum's cooking something.
Entries.fall_Thu6_1: I think my dad might be coming back next year.#$e#I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
Entries.fall_Thu6: I guess I should start thinking about moving out soon...$s#$e#...But I would miss mum's fish casserole, so I dunno...$s#$e#I hate making decisions.
Entries.fall_Thu: Have you ever noticed all the spider webs that appear during autumn?#$e#If you get up early you'll see them covered in dew... like little stars.
Entries.fall_Sun8: The first week of autumn is already over. Man, that went by fast.$s#$e#Whatever. I'm just happy that you came to visit me!#$e#So do you have anything new to tell me?
Entries.winter_Thu6_1: I think my dad is coming back this spring.#$e#It's been three years since I've seen him. This is going to be strange.
Entries.winter_Thu: My dad is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why he's not here.#$e#He's coming back soon, though.
Entries.winter_Thu_2: One thing that's nice about winter... all the mosquitoes are gone.
Entries.winter_Sun: Try not to make a mess in the house or my mum will flip.
